item.title: About me
item.description: Summary ❝Full-stack software engineer with software development experience including requirements analysis, systems design, integration patterns and testing expanding his horizons towards data science. Agile and LEAN methodology fan that loves hackathons and startup culture. Engineer understanding domains of e-commerce, logistics, finance and IoT. Guitarist, music and photography enthusiast and amateur filmmaker. Proud husband and father. ❞ Can help with e-commerce, finance, logistics, IoT, mobile, cloud, technical interviews, code reviews, startups, scrum

item.title: Contact
item.description: Social media You can find me Linked-in and PM me if you wish.
